definition: plaited matting (of rushes, bamboo etc)/silkworm basket/metal foil/foil paper
gold and silver foil/gold and silver leaf

sentences.english: The plan was to cover the temple in silver foil, although that never came to fruition.
sentences.chinese: 尽管从未成为现实，但原计划是要用银箔装饰银阁寺。

sentences.english: The chocolates are individually wrapped in gold and silver foil.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力分别用金箔纸和银箔纸包装。

sentences.english: In case of dispute, this verification method using a silver foil shall be used.
sentences.chinese: 在争议情况下，应采用银箔确认方法。

definition: gold and silver foil/gold and silver leaf
plaited matting (of rushes, bamboo etc)/silkworm basket/metal foil/foil paper
variant of 鎦金|镏金[liu2 jin1]
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
vein lines (in marble or fingerprint)/grain (in wood etc)
acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
mother-of-pearl (used in ornamentation and in TCM)
